sparring partner at the judging table, the reliably effusive and ditzy Paula Abdul , who had departed the previous season. And Simon Cowell made little secret that he was bored and ready to get on to his next series, The X Factor, "already a hit in Britain and scheduled to launch stateside this fall. Ellen DeGeneres , Ms. Paula Abdul 's replacement, never jelled with the other judges, including singer Kara DioGuardi , who had been brought on for the 2009 season to bolster the show in advance of Ms. Paula Abdul 's expected departure. Now Ms. Ellen DeGeneres and Ms. Kara DioGuardi are both gone. The saga of the "American Idol phenomenon, from its origins in the 2001 hit British series "Pop Idol" right up to Simon Cowell 's departure, is the focus of Richard Rushfield's breezy, gossipy "American Idol: The Untold Story.

NFL vice president Brian McCarthy said Michael Vick has been diligent in tending to community-relations commitments as part of commissioner Roger Goodell 's program of rehabilitation for him following his incarceration for federal dogfighting offenses. He's done a great job turning things around, Brian McCarthy said. "He still meets regularly with the commissioner and fulfills his obligations." Michael Vick also continues to have conversations with former Colts coach Tony Dungy , who was assigned to mentor him.

Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. "That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said. "You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there."
